definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
never put off until tomorrow what you can do today (idiom)
pinyin: dang4 tian1 shi4 dang4 tian1 bi4

definition: never put off until tomorrow what you can do today (idiom)
pinyin: dang4 tian1 shi4 dang4 tian1 bi4

sentences.english: Kangkang said that he previewed the day's lesson before class.
sentences.chinese: 康康说他课前预习当天的课程。

sentences.english: What I wear depends on the time of the day and thd places that I am going to.
sentences.chinese: 我的穿着是根据当天的时刻和我要去的地点来决定。

sentences.english: This afternoon Tietz declared the letter to be a forgery.
sentences.chinese: 当天下午Tietz声明信件是伪造的。

sentences.english: That same night, Javert wrote a letter.
sentences.chinese: 沙威在当天晚上写了一封信。

sentences.english: I went to check the day Xinyi news, did not find relevant reports.
sentences.chinese: 我又去查了当天信宜新闻，没有发现相关报道。

sentences.english: Third, after-school careful review, the consolidation of the knowledge the teacher said on the day.
sentences.chinese: 第三，课后认真复习，巩固当天老师讲过地知识。

sentences.english: That day, he removed the male goats that were streaked and spotted.
sentences.chinese: 当天拉班就将有条纹有斑点的公山羊。

sentences.english: Conclude each practice period by repeating today's idea to yourself once more.
sentences.chinese: 每次在练习结束时，都记得再复诵一遍当天的观念。

sentences.english: He made samplings of the different materials on the very day.
sentences.chinese: 他当天对那些不同的材料分别进行了抽样检验。

sentences.english: They have to spend everything they earn every day.
sentences.chinese: 因此，每天孩子们只能花光当天所赚来的钱。

sentences.english: It will take place on the day of the Lantern Festival on the Yanshui Junior High School athletic field.
sentences.chinese: 这些活动将在元宵节当天于盐水国中操场进行施放。

sentences.english: I was triage nurse that day.
A weather forecaster said it was not yet possible to predict what would happen on Christmas Day.
sentences.chinese: 有气象预报员称，目前尚无法预测圣诞当天的天气。

sentences.english: Twenty laundries were burned that night.
sentences.chinese: 当天晚上，华人开设的洗衣店就有二十家被付之一炬。

sentences.english: The stoves will arrive in Xining on Tuesday, the ministry said.
sentences.chinese: 商务部发言人称，取暖炉预计将于周二当天运抵西宁。

sentences.english: All the word-processing machines were quickly bought up the day they were offered for sale.
sentences.chinese: 所有的文字处理机在出售的当天很快被买光了。

definition: at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
